attributes.action: Save Di Bishop the lollipop ladys job
attributes.additional_details: Canford Heath Lollypop lady Di Bishop is to lose her job after 14 years of crossing Canford Heath children on Sherborne Crescent. Due to a new crossing being put in. We have been told that all children should know how to cross a busy main road with out Di safely. Please sign to help keep Di crossing out children. Thank u xx

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Local Authority
